title: Surgeon General Tafani

properties.name: description
properties.value: Surgeon General Tafani is the lead surgeon at the Duel Arena. She, along with Jaraah and the nurses Sabreen and A'abla, can heal players if they have lost hitpoints (but cannot cure poison). They can heal players who are not playing the minigame, and can be useful to players fighting in the nearby area. The healing is free of charge.

Surgeon General Tafani
Released25 March 2004 (Update)

RaceHuman

Sells itemsHitpoints cape

ExamineThis nurse really knows her stuff.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID3343

Surgeon General Tafani is the lead surgeon at the Duel Arena. She, along with Jaraah and the nurses Sabreen and A'abla, can heal players if they have lost hitpoints (but cannot cure poison). They can heal players who are not playing the minigame, and can be useful to players fighting in the nearby area. The healing is free of charge.

Tafani, as the master of Hitpoints, sells the Hitpoints cape to players with level 99 in Hitpoints for 99,000.

Contents

  • 1 Stock
  • 2 Dialogue
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)
  • 4 Trivia

Stock[edit | edit source]

Note: If a player has multiple 99s, they will receive the trimmed variant of the cape instead.

ItemPrice
sold at
Hitpoints cape 99,000

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 February 2022
(update)

The red cross symbol has been changed to a red asterisk to comply with Article 53 of the 1949 Geneva Convention I as well as Section 6 of the United Kingdom's Geneva Conventions Act 1957.

31 March 2016
(update)

A typo with Surgeon General Tafani's dialogue has been corrected.

18 October 2006
(update)

The NPC was renamed from "Tafani" to "Surgeon General Tafani".

Gallery (historical)[edit | edit source]

present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Tafani is one of only three female NPCs that sells a Cape of Accomplishment, the other two being the Hunting expert and Twiggy O'Korn.
  • Despite being a surgeon, her examine options refers to her as a nurse.
  • When she heals a player she appears to be using the same animation that is used to pickpocket an NPC.
  • Her hat is almost identical with Nurse hat, which is obtained from A Tail of Two Cats.
